org.mokai
Interface Action

All Known Implementing Classes:
AddPrefixAction, AddSpacesAction, AddSuffixAction, ConcatAction, CopyAction, RemoveAction, ReplaceAction, UpdateAction
public interface Action

Performs an operation with a message (validation, transformation, etc.). Actions can be invoked after messages are received, before and/or after they have been processed by a connector.

Author:
German Escobar

Method Summary
 void execute(Message message)
          This method is called by the routing engine to execute the action.
 

Method Detail

execute

void execute(Message message)
             throws Exception
This method is called by the routing engine to execute the action.

Parameters:
message - the message that is being routed.
Throws:
Exception - if something goes wrong.
